loadingMsgs: This is a zero-sum game. If someone wins, someone will lose.
If you continue to opt in, are you sure that you are the winner?
Sometimes, opt-out is not shameful, at least you keep your money.
Fomo3D? This is Qiu3D, are you sure you are not in the wrong place?
If you are a leek, quit, come here will make your EOS blood gone~
I only say once the cheats of winning, that is to buy tickets that cover all possibilities, and only buy once
In the gamble of life, you will always lose, but you never believe that it will be the next time.
Everyone who comes here is like you, wants to speculate! You must be the smartest one?
This is a website built by a madman team. Quit, quit! ! !
Is your EOS air dropped? Are you sure you want to give it to someone else?
Do you know how much effort we have made for this dApp? Love us!
Qiu3D is a game that a fool can participate in, and will continue to participate~ Are you stupid?
If you just want to learn Chinese in this game, don't enter!

Any hit option of ticket will get prize
up to 90% volume of prize pool

CardBuyTicketComponent.transFailed: Charging failed,something error.Check console log for more info.

CardBetComponent.betNotOpened: Ticket holders didn't open the bet,be patient

rules: Buy tickets, you need to make predictions for 1 to 5 options, at least 1 option
The price of a ticket will be increased slightly with the number of tickets purchased by players
Any hit option of ticket will get prize , up to 90% volume of prize pool
Since all ticket holders divide the prize pool, the odds indicated in the ticket option are the current dynamic odds, which may be dynamically adjusted with the subsequent ticket sales.
When 30% ticket holders choose FULL-TIME-RESULT option, and HOME-DRAW-AWAY both choosen,the SMART CONTRACT will give out the odds and make the bets opened
You can bets for HOME-DRAW-AWAY and get the reward by bets*odds.
Invite your friend to buy the ticket,you can get 10% bonues of sales,return to your wallet address immediately
Ticket holders will get the dividend
